summary: Completed comprehensive testing of KickPredict World Cup prediction app. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend core features working well with minor session management issues.

ui_bugs.issue: JWT tokens expire during extended testing sessions causing redirects to auth page
Create league modal overlay blocks navigation clicks until closed

passed_tests: Match sync with mock World Cup data (64 matches generated)
Home page hero section and stats bar
Fixtures page with match cards and filters
Mobile responsive design with bottom navigation
Points system calculation (4pts exact, 3pts goal diff, 2pts tendency)
